channel.title: YouTube on Cloud Family
channel.description: Recent content in YouTube on Cloud Family

item.title: Azure YouTube Channels
item.description: Azure Advent Calendar The Azure Advent Calendar YouTube Channel. Here you will find around 75 videos all about Azure. Look out for the next advent for more awesome content. Sam Cogan A YouTube Channel from MVP Sam Cogan focussed on learning Azure. Includes the Azure Snippets series, a collection of short, to the point tutorials focussed on working with Azure. Mark Scholman A YouTube Channel from MVP Mark Scholman focussed on learning Azure Stack.
